ModMetaData.name: Xenotype Alteration
ModMetaData.author: apricot77
ModMetaData.description:
Remove or add appearance some genes from Vanilla Xenotype. Just remove gene mandatory rules, continue to use is also available. Expands the range of character makeup.
Genie remove：Hair Bald Only add：Body Standard
Impid remove：Skin color rules , Hair color rules
Yttakin remove：Beard Always , Hair Bald Only add：Body Standard , Body Thin Various changes regarding "Fur Skin"
Highmate remove：Skin color rules , Hair color rules
